text: I know you've heard me say this probably
a million times but this right before me
really is probably my favorite thing to
eat in the entire world
gangs ohm is a southern type comforting
soup about 20 cloves of garlic a few
chunks of fresh turmeric root and about
30 red chili peppers are pureed and a
blender to form the base of the soup
thin slices of sweet pineapple and in
this case Barracuda fish are boiled with
the other ingredients to create a
combination that's fiercely pungent at
the very end of the cooking process
about half a cup of lime juice is added
to the soup
unleashing some serious sourness into
the mixture the result is a Thai soup
that looks more like a smoldering pot of
lava so intensely strong and flavorful
it will singe your throat and straighten
your spine with each bite first I'm
going to taste some of the soup
all that
that is ridiculously good that is sour
and spicy it's absurdly spicy it will
burn the back of your throat clear out
your novel I can eat that every day for
the rest of my life but it's sweetened
up with pineapple so grab some of the
pineapple
the pungent foot come on I got a chili
in the back of the throat
couple hundred flavors of that soup are
just unbelievable also it's a fish based
so it's actually made with Barracuda
this particular one grab a piece of fish
bring that over the suit
oh yeah
that is flavor beyond your imagination
